[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@cordjs/client](./client.md) &gt; [PluginInterface](./client.plugininterface.md) &gt; [preStart](./client.plugininterface.prestart.md)

## PluginInterface.preStart() method

Runs before [PluginInterface.start()](./client.plugininterface.start.md)

**Signature:**

```typescript
preStart?(): void | Promise<void>;
```
**Returns:**

void \| Promise&lt;void&gt;

## Remarks

:::note

You can still add middlewares in this function, but not in [PluginInterface.start()](./client.plugininterface.start.md)

:::

All plugin start functions are called at the same time whenever [Client.start()](./client.client.start.md) is caled.

This is where you would do stuff such as adding middleware defined by other plugins.
